HOPTOAD_URL - Static variable in class com.sniflabs.hoptoad.HoptoadNotice
 
HoptoadNotice - Class in com.sniflabs.hoptoad
HoptoadNotice:
A Java wrapper for hoptoad error reporting application, because java guys need access to cool error reporting too!!

requires:
yamlbeans from http://sourceforge.net/projects/yamlbeans/

Sample use:
catch (Exception exp) { HoptoadNotice notice = new HoptoadNotice("fff9de2222222e156015fb875844de43",exp); notice.postData(true); }
HoptoadNotice() - Constructor for class com.sniflabs.hoptoad.HoptoadNotice
default constructor.
HoptoadNotice(String, Throwable) - Constructor for class com.sniflabs.hoptoad.HoptoadNotice
Create a new HoptoadNotice notice for sending to hoptoadapp.com
NOTE: this does not send actually send the notice

P

postData(boolean) - Method in class com.sniflabs.hoptoad.HoptoadNotice
Send the data to the HopToadApp.

R

request - Variable in class com.sniflabs.hoptoad.HoptoadNotice
 

S

session - Variable in class com.sniflabs.hoptoad.HoptoadNotice
 

T

toYaml() - Method in class com.sniflabs.hoptoad.HoptoadNotice
return the YAML string for this notice.
NOTE: HoptoadNotice reuqires a java YAML library called yamlbeans.
